title: Integrated development environment (IDE)
description: Learn how to install and use the IntelliJ.

title: How to write Java syntax and create variables
description: Discover the basic idea behind programming. Write your first Java program. Use variables to store and retrieve information.

title: Using Methods and Conditional Statements
description: Use if-else statements and switch-case statements. Write Java programs to tackle any decision makeing scenario.

title: How to Create functions
description: Create functions in Java. Declare methods with input arguments and return types. Call the functions you create.

title: How to Create Loops
description: Use for and while loops to iterate over a block of code. Learn how to write nested loops. Use 2D arrays to store and retrieve information.

title: Debugging
description: Use the IDE to find and solve problems in code.
